Perceptor:

"To all maxiamls, and specially to you... RODIMUS PRIME, Auto-fools' 
leader" said Perceptor Voice while in maximal computers appeared a 
image of  Peceptor in Predacon's lab with the unconcious femme and 
the speakers spread his voice in all battlefield"I reprogrammed this 
femme who was knew among yours as Nightlight... I warned you, 
Maixmals, if you attemp to reprogram again her, that will end in her 
death... I'm not kidding... I set her a virus that will destroy her 
spar if its detects a not allowed reprogramation prosses... I erased 
all her memories so for her you will be enemies and as enemies, she 
will attack you... MAster Hydras,I finished, If you desire to say 
anything else..."
